question: The University Grants Commission (UGC) has directed universities to use the online courses of which portal, for transferring credits?
explanation:
The University Grants Commission (UGC) has recently directed universities and colleges to use the Massive Open Online Courses (MOOC) available on the ‘SWAYAM’ portal of the Ministry of Human Resources and Development, for credit transfer.
UGC has also released a list of 82 undergraduate and 42 postgraduate non-engineering Massive Open Online Courses (MOOC) available on the portal. As per the UGC’s recent regulations on credit framework for online learning courses, the students may enrol for the MOOCs and avail credits from July 2020.
